item.description:
At this meeting we will discuss the BAIL OUTS and continue our discussion of Naomi Wolfe's End of America which outlines the 10 steps that are traditionally employed when a government moves from freedom to fascism.

We will also review the concepts of "Democracy" and "Republic".

Bring a friend. Refreshments will be served.

*Pssst* Make sure you click on the CONTENTS graphic on the right for a larger view.

group.name: FREEDOM IS FUNDAMENTAL Book Club and Discussion Group

item.name: The End of America by Naomi Wolfe
